department.en: Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering

goal.ch:
-建立嵌入式系統專業知識與基本研究能力
-訓練建嵌入式系統系統並提升實作能力
-培養發展自主思考與跨領域創新能力
goal.en:
-Be able to understand the fundamental knowledge of embedded systems and be able to have basic research skills
-Be able to construct embedded systems and the ability to implement the basic components of the system
-Be able to development self-learning skills and inter-disciplinary learning skills

outline.ch:
1. 課程說明
2. 嵌入式系統與互動技術介紹
3. 嵌入式系統與互動裝置案例說明
4. 微控制器的程式架構
5. 微控制器函式庫與基礎操作實習
6. 感測器介紹
7. 輸入輸出說明
8. 電子電路基礎與電路圖繪製
9. 序列傳輸與類比讀取
10. 傳感器結合與應用
11. 藍芽與微控制器的使用
12. 專題應用實作
outline.en:
1. Course description
2. Embedded system technology introduction
3. Case description of embedded systems
4. Microcontroller program architecture
5. Microcontroller function library and basic operation practice
6. Sensor Introduction
7. Input and output description
8. Electronic circuit foundation and circuit diagram layout
9. Sequence transmission and analog reading
10. Embedded Sensors for critical applications
11. Bluetooth operation practice
12. Application project implementation

textbook.ch: “Embedded System: A Unified Hardware/Software Introduction“, Frank Vahid, Tony Givargis, J. Wiley ＆ Sons (2002)
textbook.en: “Embedded System: A Unified Hardware/Software Introduction“, Frank Vahid, Tony Givargis, J. Wiley ＆ Sons (2002)
